author: Cedric Canard
content: Congratulations Andreas. I am sure you will be having a lot of fun with your new camera. I admit that I am interested in trying the EM1. I didn't like the feel of the EM5 at all, as much as I wanted to like it but it looks like the EM1 has had some serious work done to its ergonomics so I would be interested to know how I react to it when I hold it. That first sensory perception is everything for me. If it's not there then it doesn't matter how good the camera is in terms of photo quality. But by the sounds of your experience, this camera might just have the whole package ðŸ™‚
